name: Diabetes
cause: Insulin resistance or insufficient insulin production
prevention: Healthy diet, regular exercise, weight control
treatment: Insulin therapy, oral medications, lifestyle changes

name: Hypertension
cause: Chronic high blood pressure due to lifestyle or genetics
prevention: Low-sodium diet, exercise, reduced stress

name: Asthma
cause: Inflammation and narrowing of airways
prevention: Avoid allergens, quit smoking, use air filters

name: Tuberculosis
cause: Infection by Mycobacterium tuberculosis
prevention: BCG vaccination, avoid close contact with infected individuals

name: Malaria
cause: Plasmodium parasite transmitted by mosquitoes
prevention: Use mosquito nets, repellents, antimalarial drugs
treatment: Antimalarial medications such as chloroquine or artemisinin

name: COVID-19
cause: Infection with the SARS-CoV-2 virus
prevention: Vaccination, mask-wearing, social distancing

name: Influenza
cause: Influenza virus infection
prevention: Annual flu vaccination, hygiene practices

name: Pneumonia
cause: Bacterial, viral, or fungal infection of the lungs
prevention: Vaccinations, good hygiene, avoid smoking

name: Alzheimer's Disease
cause: Degeneration of brain cells, possibly genetic
prevention: Mentally active lifestyle, healthy diet
treatment: Medications to manage symptoms, cognitive therapy

name: Parkinson's Disease
cause: Loss of dopamine-producing neurons in the brain
prevention: No guaranteed prevention, but healthy lifestyle may help
treatment: Levodopa, physical therapy, deep brain stimulation

name: HIV/AIDS
cause: Infection with the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
prevention: Safe sex, avoid sharing needles, PrEP medication

name: Hepatitis B
cause: Hepatitis B virus infection
prevention: Vaccination, avoid contact with infected blood

name: Cholera
cause: Vibrio cholerae infection via contaminated water or food
prevention: Clean drinking water, proper sanitation
treatment: Rehydration therapy, antibiotics in severe cases

name: Dengue
cause: Dengue virus transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes
prevention: Mosquito control, avoid bites

name: Typhoid Fever
cause: Salmonella Typhi bacteria through contaminated food/water
prevention: Safe drinking water, proper sanitation

name: Anemia
cause: Lack of healthy red blood cells or hemoglobin
prevention: Iron-rich diet, vitamin B12 intake

name: Migraine
cause: Neurological condition with genetic and environmental triggers
prevention: Avoid known triggers, regular sleep and meals

name: Depression
cause: Combination of genetic, biological, environmental, and psychological factors
prevention: Early support, stress management, social connection

name: Osteoporosis
cause: Low bone density due to aging or hormonal changes
prevention: Calcium and vitamin D, weight-bearing exercises

name: Skin Cancer
cause: Uncontrolled growth of skin cells, often from UV exposure
prevention: Sunscreen, protective clothing, avoid tanning beds
